>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/auth/{provider}/login"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Initiate OAuth login flow with the specified provider (e.g., github)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"OAuth provider (github)","name":"provider","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Path to redirect after login","name":"redirect_to","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
